content: I do not have access to current sales data. however, according to various reports, the demand for luxury vehicles has been increasing steadily over the past few years. in 2019, luxury vehicle sales reached a record high of 2.33 million units in the united states. this trend is driven primarily by the growing wealth of middle-class consumers in emerging markets, such as china and india, who are seeking to buy products that reflect their status and success. additionally, the rise of the sharing economy and ride-hailing services has also contributed to the increased demand for luxury vehicles, with many consumers choosing to rent high-end cars for special occasions or for business trips. however, the covid-19 pandemic has severely impacted the luxury car market, leading to significant drops in sales in the first half of 2020.
